quoteText: If TunnelBear is contacted with a complaint regarding or arising from your use of the Services, TunnelBear may deem your service usage in violation of this Agreement and terminate your account without notice.
title: TunnelBear can delete your content if you violate the terms

tosdr.case: This service can delete your content if you violate the terms
tosdr.tldr: The privacy policy states that "[i]f TunnelBear is contacted with a complaint regarding or arising from your use of the Services, TunnelBear may deem your service usage in violation of this Agreement and terminate your account without notice".
